Title: La La Land
Summary: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles.a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

Title: Ladies in Lavender
Summary: Two sisters befriend a mysterious foreigner who washes up on the beach of their 1930s Cornish seaside village.

Title: Highlander
Summary: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent.a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".
